text:
HandStack | SoMa, San Francisco, CA (onsite preferred, remote & intern ok) Mobilize thousands. Fast. | handstack.com

Are you passionate about politics, community organizing, activism, or connecting people?

HandStack is an online tool for coordinating thousands of people, in real time, for political campaigns and community organizations.

==positions==

Looking for strong mobile web app development experience: A full-stack developer with experience in Angular, Cordova, and Ionic. We're part of the Tumml accelerator.

Reach out to jess (at) handstack dot com. We're happy to chat!
